headline: Why AbbVie’s (ABBV) Drug Setback Creates A Prime Buy-The-Dip Moment
summary: AbbVie stock fell 10% after emraclidine, its drug for schizophrenia, failed during the final stages of its trials. The setback has spooked investors but I believe it is unlikely to hinder the company’s growth prospects and is therefore a perfect ‘buy the dip’ opportunity. AbbVie Inc. (ABBV) is a global biopharmaceutical company, founded in 2013 […]
